name: Snowboarding
description:
Snowboarding is simulating arcade sports game with scores.
Different from other ski games,the skiers don't have any engine. Just follow gravity, Controlle the board with carving.

The length of the snow path is about 500 meters long and 100 meters wide; The slope is 15 degrees.
Considering wind resistance and friction in the game, the maximum speed of snowway can only reach 30kmh.
A new 3D artist has been added to our team, and we will make more maps and different slopes of snowways as soon as possible.

The game have 3 levels according to the difficulty.
Players need to arrive at the end of the specified time, and score according to the remaining time.
You can get more time by specifying the flash position.
Hit the snowman will be slowed down, snowman on behalf of the novice stay in the snow path.
